title: Lemon Kosho
ingredients: - 2 tablespoons chopped oil-cured Calabrian chilies (about 6) or fresh red Thai chilies
directions: QUARTER the lemons, flick out the seeds, then chop, skin and all, into ¼-inch pieces. Put them in a blender, add the chilies and salt, and blend on low speed to a thick puree, about 45 seconds. Scrape down the sides of the blender, then add the oil and ½ cup water and blend on high speed until it’s as smooth as possible, about 1 minute.
IT keeps in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
